title: The Alaska Job
description: Case Lee embarks on an adrenaline-fueled quest filled with ancient secrets and lethal adversaries as he follows an age-old treasure trail packed with mystery.Tasked with recovering a fabled billion-dollar hoard, Case becomes entangled in a web of espionage, assassins, and ruthless competitors. As he follows the trail of clues etched in long-ago history, danger lurks at every turn. From encounters with enigmatic Buddhist monks to unearthing secrets held by long-forgotten Russian fur traders, Case's journey evolves into a race against time and a battle for survival. Spies and brutal treasure hunters are hot on his trail, creating a combustible mix of shadowy intentions and insatiable greed.Case must rely on his instincts and experience to navigate a world where every step could be his last. To even the odds, Case calls on his former teammates, unleashing their special skills in a high-stakes race against time. Brace yourself for a white-knuckle ride through Korea, windswept arctic islands, and Alaska's untamed wilderness as Case is pushed to the brink. Twists and turns and non-stop action hallmark this globe-trotting mystery thrillerâ€”the twelfth stand-alone novel from Best-Selling author Vince Milam.
author: Vince Milam
